```{r}
deriv <- function(x, y)
{
    dydx <- diff(y) / diff(x)
    c(dydx, tail(dydx, 1))
}
library(oce)
d <- read.oce("d201211_0048.cnv")
ds <- subset(d, 250 < pressure & pressure <= 350)
plotProfile(ds, xtype="temperature")
plotProfile(ds, xtype=deriv(ds[["pressure"]], ds[["temperature"]]))
plotProfile(ds, xtype="salinity")
plotProfile(ds, xtype=deriv(ds[["pressure"]], ds[["salinity"]]))
plotProfile(ds, xtype="density")
plotProfile(ds, xtype=deriv(ds[["pressure"]], ds[["density"]]))
plotProfile(ds, xtype="Rrho")
plotTS(ds)
```
